original_text: The police returned to the city officers. They told them what Paul had said. The officers now understood that Paul and Silas were citizens of Rome. This made them very afraid.
korean_text: 부하들이 이 말을 상관들에게 보고하니 그들이 로마 사람이라 하는 말을 듣고 두려워하여

sentences.original_text: The police returned to the city officers.
They told them what Paul had said.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 바울이 말한 것을 그들에게 말했습니다.

sentences.original_text: that Paul and Silas were citizens of Rome.
